user@localhost:~/test$ singularity storage explore name path
Path   LastModified         Size  IsDir  
path1  2023-04-05 06:07:08  100   true   
path2  2023-04-05 06:07:08  100   false  

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose storage explore name path
Path   LastModified         Size  IsDir  DirID  NumItems  Hash   
path1  2023-04-05 06:07:08  100   true   xx     100       hash1  
path2  2023-04-05 06:07:08  100   false         -1        hash2
